Articles.Content: Is it me or graphics have become blurry after ksp 1.12 update. In my case the parts have become blurry.  Planet texture looks fine but the parts graphics look a bit blurry at a normal distance but when i zoom in it is almost good but not perfect. Anybody else facing this issue?

@PriyanshuRox:

Welcome to the forum! This is probably mod related; right now there are several mods I use which are now casting shadows and what appears to be "visual dancing" of the texture of parts. Hang in there, once 1.12.1 drops and there are more mods updated, the problems you are experiencing should go away.

Again, welcome to the forum and if you have any more questions, do not hesitate to ask!
